name: Dichotomy (itch) (tranand5)
description:
Delve into the strange setting of your childhood home, where some things are familiar, while others are eerily foreign. What happened here? Switch between worlds, solve puzzles, and learn the truth behind the Dichotomy!

Development Team

Bella Ciagne - Programming

Adam Cohen - Programming, Technical Design

Marshall Gaines - Level Design

Baxter Deni - Art

Andrew Tran - Sound Design

Instructions

Move the player with WASD. Jump with SPACE. Press E to interact with objects in the game. Pres ESC to pause.

Sound Effects Used

Portal Sound

Flame Vents

Air Vents

Breaker Switch

Level Complete

Pushing Objects

Clock Drops
